titles.title: To direct the President to take such actions as may be necessary to prohibit the purchase of public or private real estate located in the United States by an foreign governments.
To direct the President to take such actions as may be necessary to prohibit the purchase of public or private real estate located in the United States by an foreign governments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill requires the President to take actions necessary to bar foreign governments from purchasing public or private real estate in the United States.
